Build: 3.2 RC2

Tobias, you were the last who touched that code. Can we just add a null check?
Dani, Markus, do you approve for 3.2?
Tobias, please add a regression test and steps to reproduce, so that we can verify the fix.
The problem only occurs if the binding of the initializer is null. In this case the quickfix cannot be offered.

Created an attachment (id=40237)
patch with regression tests
